body:
Hey people of the avicus network.
So since Fouled retired, I wrote a new appeal, and got unbanned. 

So I just wanna say hi to everyone again :)

ama
body_tagged:
Hey people of the avicus network.
So since Fouled retired, I wrote a new appeal, and got unbanned. 

So I just wanna say hi to everyone again :)

pretty good packmaker, not sure about ur pvp, nice guy, chill, american octopus. (you said basic)

i mean, i dont know, it feels unorganized and, idk what to say but somewhat "dying". not actually sure if there will be more than 8 teams for the next tournament but who knows, changes can be made and things can happen.
